description: Svetlana Tikhanovskaya tells people not to "stay on the sidelines", six days after a disputed vote.
title: Belarus election: Exiled leader calls weekend of 'peaceful rallies'
title_page: Belarus election: Exiled leader calls weekend of 'peaceful rallies' - BBC News
maintext: Many have faced more vicious beatings and the mistreatment of detainees remaining in prisons continues. Volunteers outside the detention centre in Minsk on Friday asked us to be quiet and urged people not to clap and chant to support the detainees. They say that otherwise those who remain behind the prison walls will get beaten in revenge.
